item.title: Cheltenham Early Modern Wills
item.description: These wills from the Gloucestershire Archives for Cheltenham and adjoining parishes have been transcribed by Judy Kimber on behalf of VCH Gloucestershire.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Swindon Village probate inventories, 1711-1729
item.description: Five inventories survive at Gloucestershire Archives for the small parish of Swindon (to the west of Cheltenham), and have been transcribed by an Archives volunteer. Among them are the inventories of two yeomen and one thatcher.
item.dc:creator: JamesH
